valid.condition: {{body.status != 'error' & if(ifempty(body.code, body.Code), ifempty(body.code, body.Code) = '200' | ifempty(body.code, body.Code) = '0', true)}}

universal.description: Performs an arbitrary authorized API call.

sendCampaign.label: Send a Campaign
sendCampaign.description: Sends an existing campaign by its key.

cloneCampaign.name: cloneCampaign
cloneCampaign.label: Clone a Campaign
cloneCampaign.description: Clones an existing campaign by its key.

watchContacts.name: watchContacts
watchContacts.label: Watch Contacts
watchContacts.description: Triggers when a new contact is added to the mailing list.

createCampaign.name: createCampaign
createCampaign.label: Create a Campaign

expect.help:
Template strings are supported. For example:
 First name: `$[FNAME|Customer]$`
 Last name: `$[LNAME|Customer]$`

expect.help: A valid HTML URL for your campaign content.
expect.name: content_url

deleteCampaign.name: deleteCampaign
deleteCampaign.label: Delete a Campaign
deleteCampaign.description: Deletes an existing campaign by its key.

watchCampaigns.name: watchCampaigns
watchCampaigns.label: Watch Campaigns
watchCampaigns.description: Triggers when a campaign is under review, reviewed, stopped, canceled, paused, resumed, sent, or A/B test is completed.

subscribeContact.name: subscribeContact
subscribeContact.label: Subscribe a Contact
subscribeContact.description: Subscribes a new contact or updates an existing contact in a mailing list.

addContactsToList.name: addContactsToList
addContactsToList.label: Add Contacts to a List
addContactsToList.description: Adds multiple existing contacts to a mailing list by their emails.

createMailingList.name: createMailingList
createMailingList.label: Create a Mailing List
createMailingList.description: Creates a new mailing list with contacts.

deleteMailingList.name: deleteMailingList
deleteMailingList.label: Delete a Mailing List
deleteMailingList.description: Deletes an existing mailing list by its ID.

getCampaignReport.name: getCampaignReport
getCampaignReport.label: Get a Campaign Report
getCampaignReport.description: Retrieves the detail report of a campaign by its key.

updateMailingList.name: updateMailingList
updateMailingList.label: Update a Mailing List
updateMailingList.description: Updates an existing mailing list by its key.

watchUnsubscribes.name: watchUnsubscribes
watchUnsubscribes.label: Watch Unsubscribes
watchUnsubscribes.description: Triggers when a contact unsubscribes from any mailing list.

unsubscribeContact.name: unsubscribeContact
unsubscribeContact.label: Unsubscribe a Contact
unsubscribeContact.description: Unsubscribes an existing contact from a list by its email.

listRecentCampaigns.label: List Campaigns
